```{r}
# Dataset do R
#data()
JohnsonJohnson
```

```{r}
start(JohnsonJohnson) # onde a serie temporal inicia
end(JohnsonJohnson) # onde a s?rie temporal termina
class(JohnsonJohnson) # informa a classe dos dados
```

```{r}
plot(JohnsonJohnson)
```

```{r}
aggregate(JohnsonJohnson, nfrequency = 4, FUN = sum) # somas trimestrais

```
```{r}
aggregate(JohnsonJohnson, nfrequency = 1, FUN = mean) # medias anuais
```

```{r}
# Por meses
monthplot(JohnsonJohnson, col.base = 2, labels = month.abb)
```

```{r}
# Extraindo uma janela
janela<-window(JohnsonJohnson, start=c(1965), end=(1975))
janela
```
